Jackson, Lewis, SCHNITZLER & KRUPMAN
261 MADISON AVENUE NEw YORK,NY. 1016.

212) 687-8200

PRACTICE LIMITED TO LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT
LAW AND LITIGATION ON BEHALF OF MANAGEMENT

March 13, 1967

Arthur Stevens, Esq.
Senior Vice President
Lorillara

666 Fifth Avenue

New York, New York 10103

Re: Smoking Policy
Dear Arthur:

Enclosed please find a copy of the New York State
; he) New Sork Ste
regulaions on smoking.

very truly yours,
JACKSON, LEWIS, SCHNITZLER & KRUPMAN
4
lA
Gregory J2)Rasin

GIR/abd
Enclosure

ce: Kenneth Abrams
